sentences.en: A cub's playful antics don't distract mother cheetah from scanning the plains for threats - or a meal.
sentences.cn: 猎豹妈妈扫视着平原寻找威胁者或猎物的踪影,丝毫不因小豹的顽皮动作而分心.

sentences.en: A female cheetah and her three cubs.
sentences.cn: 一头雌性猎豹和它的三只幼崽.

sentences.en: An adult cheetah rests in the grass at a Jersey zoo.
sentences.cn: 在泽西动物园中,一头成年猎豹正在草地上小憩.

sentences.en: Ancient Cheetah Fossil Points to Old World Roots?
sentences.cn: 远古猎豹化石表明其发源于东半球?

sentences.en: Any of several felines, such as the cheetah or the snow leopard.
sentences.cn: 这片地区是濒临灭绝的雪豹的栖息地.

sentences.en: Cheetah game's most valuable part of the keyboard is one of the left part of.
sentences.cn: 猎豹游戏键盘最有价值的部分是其中的左侧部分.

sentences.en: Despite the efforts of conservationists, the cheetah is still in peril.
sentences.cn: 除了动物保护主义者的保护, 猎豹仍处于极大的危险之中.

sentences.en: First, you show up on my cheetah hunt.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你在我抓猎豹的时候就出现了.

sentences.en: Fourteen - month - old cheetah cubs play in tall grass, Botswana.
sentences.cn: 十四个月大的小猎豹在高高的草丛中玩耍, 博茨瓦纳.

sentences.en: He shows me some cheetah tracks.
sentences.cn: 他教我看豹子留下的踪迹.

sentences.en: How fast can a cheetah run?
Imagine you’re a cheetah and you see two juicy gazelles grazing in the grass.
sentences.cn: 想像你是一个猎豹, 你看见两只味道鲜美的瞪羚正在草地上吃草.

sentences.en: Police and wildlife experts were called to the scene, and the injured cheetah was later caught by a pest control worker.
sentences.cn: 警察和动物救护专家都被召集到了现场，这头受伤的猎豹后来被一名有害物控制人员抓获。

sentences.en: Teacher: No you can't. A cheetah can run fast. Who can fly high?
sentences.cn: 老师: 不,你不行. 豹子跑得快. 谁能飞得高?

sentences.en: The cheetah can attain speeds of up to 97 kph.
sentences.cn: 猎豹的奔跑速度每小时可达97公里.

sentences.en: The cheetah is generally credited as the world's fastest animal.
sentences.cn: 猎豹被公认是世界上跑得最快的动物.

sentences.en: Unfamiliar to many, the Cheetah of the southern hemisphere was born in secrecy for political causes.
sentences.cn: 对很多人来说, 它的出现带着一些神秘和政治色彩.

trans.tran_en: a member of the cat family that has long legs and black spots on its fur, and can run extremely fast
a member of the cat family that has long legs and black spots on its fur, and can run extremely fast
